scripts.package-en: bestzip package-en.zip assets brightspace-core-bundle.js imsmanifest.xml index.html
scripts.package-fr: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.copyFileSync('imsmanifest.xml','imsmanifest.xml.bak'); fs.copyFileSync('imsmanifest_fr.xml','imsmanifest.xml');" && bestzip package-fr.zip assets brightspace-core-bundle.js imsmanifest.xml index_fr.html && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.copyFileSync('imsmanifest.xml.bak','imsmanifest.xml'); fs.unlinkSync('imsmanifest.xml.bak');"
scripts.package-bs: bestzip bs-critical.zip assets brightspace-core-bundle.js index.html launch.html
scripts.verify-bs-zip: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const files=['launch.html','index.html','brightspace-core-bundle.js','assets']; const missing=files.filter(f=>!fs.existsSync(path.join(process.cwd(),f))); if(missing.length){console.error('Missing:',missing.join(',')); process.exit(1);} console.log('OK: launch.html + index.html + bundle + assets present.');"
scripts.package-all: npm run package-en && npm run package-fr
